title: "Computational Chemistry in the Age of AI: From DFT to Neural Potentials"
description: A comprehensive look at how Machine Learning is revolutionizing computational chemistry, bridging the gap between quantum accuracy and classical speed.

title: "Large Language Models: A Deep Dive into Architecture and Capabilities"
description: An in-depth exploration of Transformer architecture, Attention mechanisms, and the evolution of LLMs from GPT-1 to GPT-4 and beyond.

title: Building Scalable Web Apps with Modern Stacks
description: A guide to modern web architecture, focusing on performance, scalability, and the shift towards edge computing and serverless patterns.

title: The Future of Computational Chemistry: AI & Quantum Computing
description: Exploring how Artificial Intelligence and Quantum Computing are revolutionizing the field of computational chemistry, from drug discovery to materials science.

title: Welcome to My Enhanced Blog
description: A demonstration of the new Markdown-based blog system with Math and Code support.
